response.overview: Matthew Summers (Reginald P. Louis), a loving father and husband, is held captive by James Campbell (Theodore Bouloukos, Best Supporting Actor 2014 accolade in The New Yorker), the ruthless head of the all-powerful Campbell Corporation, who accuses him of the murder of his brother. In the name of his family, James will push Matthew beyond his limits, who will have to do what needs to be done for his own family to survive. How far will they go?
response.title: Sacrifice
